core.reverter

Class ReverterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.reverter.ReverterManager

  • public class ReverterManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the ActionReverters that can be used by Admins.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReverterManager(java.util.List<ActionReverter> actionReverters)
      Construct an AdminReverterManager with actionReverters.

      Gets all the ActionReverters sorted by their type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReverterManager

        public ReverterManager(java.util.List<ActionReverter> actionReverters)
        Construct an AdminReverterManager with actionReverters.
        Parameters:
        actionReverters - A list of ActionReverters that are used to undo User actions.

    • Method Detail

      • getRevertersByUsername

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<ActionReverter>> getRevertersByUsername()
        Gets all the ActionReverters sorted by username of User who did the action.
        Returns:
        a Map of username as keys and a list of ActionReverter associate with the username as values.

      • getRevertersByType

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<ActionReverter>> getRevertersByType()
        Gets all the ActionReverters sorted by their type.
        Returns:
        a Map of type as keys and a list of ActionReverter with that type as values.

      • addReverter

        public void addReverter(ActionReverter reverter)
        Add the given reverter to the collection of all reverters, named actionReverters
        Parameters:
        reverter - the reverter that will be added to actionReverters

      • removeRevert

        public void removeRevert(ActionReverter reverter)
